message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I get $6000 and you get $4000. This way we both benefit from settling early.
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better for both of us. I propose we split it 60/40 in my favor, as the money will be worth less with each round.

Bob, this is getting us nowhere fast. I'm willing to compromise, but it needs to be fair. I'll take $5500, leaving you with $4500. Think about the decreasing value - taking this deal now is better than risking getting less later.
Alice, I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it 55/45 in my favor. We both get a reasonable amount, and we avoid further devaluation of the money.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but you're leaving me with no choice but to inch closer to my original offer.  I'll take $5200, you get $4800. Let's end this before the money shrinks even more.
